title: New Life in Utopia
description: A young hog hunting dog finds herself lost and alone after being abandoned by her cruel owners. They also cause the death of her litter-mate, who is her best friend. She wanders for days, hungry and scared, before happening upon a ranch where Texas State Park Ranger Jake Pickett and his wife are building a log cabin near the small town of Utopia, Texas. With trepidation, this part pit bull dog struggles to overcome her past tragedies and learn to trust enough to become a member of their family.
author: Patty Shafer
